text: Yaqeenan Allah Taalaa ney apnay rasool ko khuwab sacha dikhaya kay inshaAllah tum yaqeenan pooray aman-o-aman kay sath masjid-e-haram mein dakhil hogay sir kay baal mundwatay huye aur sir kay baal katarwatay huye (chain kay sath) nidar hoker woh inn umoor ko jaanta hai jinhen tum nahi jantay pus uss ney iss say pehlay aik nazdeek ki fatah tumhen mayassar ki
